headline: Palantir Fell Today -- Is It Time to Buy the Stock?
summary: Amid another day of big sell-offs for the broader market, Palantir (NASDAQ: PLTR) stock headed lower in Monday's trading.  The software company's share price had been down as much as 4.8% in the daily session but closed out the day's trading down 3.2%.  Meanwhile, the S&P 500 index fell 2.4%, and the Nasdaq Composite index fell 2.8%.

headline: Where Will Palantir Stock Be in 3 Years?
summary: With shares up 647% since 2022, Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) has performed spectacularly over the last three years, highlighting the potentially life-changing power of tech investing.  Since its founding in 2003, Palantir has emerged as a leader in big data analytics, enabling organizations to uncover actionable insights, detect fraud, and optimize their operations by sifting through vast volumes of information.  Over the last three years, Palantir's shares have surged alongside other tech stocks, such as Microsoft and Nvidia, which also have exposure to the AI industry.

headline: Prediction: Palantir's Stock Will Make a Huge Move After May 5
summary: Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) may be one of the most polarizing AI stocks on the market.  After the most recent round of sell-offs, Palantir stock is around 25% off its all-time high.  This is a pretty significant discount to where it was trading, but is it enough to warrant buying the stock before Palantir reports Q1 earnings on May 5?
